Introduction
============

Installs all and the newest truegalleries
This package installs alpha versions, so beware.


Changelog
=========


1.2.4 (2014.08.24)
--------------------
- Updated supersized version


1.2.3 (2012.10.31)
--------------------
- added shufflegallery

1.2 (2012.10.31)
--------------------
- added collective.ptg.quicksand
- updated a lot of the others

--------------------
